name: 蔡富安
objective:
本課程之宗旨再於讓學生全盤瞭解現代化空間資訊、掌握空間資訊自動化研究方向、提供專業擴展及實力培養、並開創研究和就業格局。課程內容包含：
一、空間資訊簡介
二、航測及遙測概要
三、地理資訊系統概要
四、全球定位及導航系統簡介
五、數碼城市簡介
The objective of this course is multi-fold. First of all, it offers an unique opportunity to obtain comprehensive understanding about modern geoinformatics. In this course, students will be able to gain insights into the state-of-the-art research, development, and applications in geoinformatics, especially the 3S technologies (RS, GIS, GPS) and their integrations for sophisticated applications such as cyber city implementation and applications. For engineering students, this course is also an effective platform for capacity-building and career extending. The main topics of this course include:
1. Introduction-Geoinformatics at a glance
2. Remote Sensing (RS) .Remote Sensing Fundamentals; Airborne Remote Sensing ; Satellite Remote Sensing
3. Geographic Information Systems (GIS)
4. Global Positioning System (GPS) and navigation
5.Cyber City Implementation and Applications
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to Geoinformatics
Week 2-3: Fundamentals of remote sensing
Week 4-6: Airborne and satellite remote sensing
Week 7: 1st mid-term exam.
Week 8-10: GIS fundamentals and applications
Week 11-12: Global Positioning and Navigation
Week 13: 2nd mid-term exam.
Week 14-15: Cyber city implementation
Week 16-17: Cyber city applications
Week 18: Final Exam.
scorePolicy:
1st mid-term: 20%
2nd mid-term: 20%
Final exam: 30%
Quizzes and homework: 40%
Class participation and performance: 10%
materials:
1. Textbook: "Remote Sensing and Image Interpretation" by Lillesand, Kiefer, and Chipman, 6th edition, Wiley.
2. Class notes will be distributed on-line.
